about_the_game:
After a long day you just want to get home, so you head to the parking garage, but something doesn't feel right. Something lurks in the dark, something that stalks you, something that wants to sell you overpriced insurance.

To make things worse, you have lost your parking card and are out of cash. Your task is to find the parking card and find some money to pay for your stay at one of the Park 'n Pay machines. While you wander the long tunnels and spacious halls of the underground garage, you may find yourself face to face with Warranty Man, or maybe he will walk up to you from behind, you always need to be on the lookout.

Instructions

The rules are simple to successfully evade Warranty Man and escape

  • Find your lost parking ticket, you need this to pay for your parking

  • Collect some cash, luckily there are a lots of lost bank notes scattered around

  • Collected all of the above? Find a Park 'n Pay machine

  • Are you being chased by the salesman? No Problem! 

    • First, do not look at him and try to outrun your chaser, eventually he will disappear

    • Second, look around, can you see any vans nearby? Go near it to pretend its yours, he doesn't sell insurance for those things. He will leave you alone, just do not look at him

  • Got caught and had to buy insurance? Well, there is always the Retry button

Playtime

The first successful run should take 30-60 minutes to complete. There are no saves, once you are caught it's game over. The locations of the bank notes and the parkig card are random on each run, so as the frequency of the salesman apparitions. The difficulty of each run is influenced by those things.

content_descriptors.notes: During the game the player will be chased by a scary looking character, which appears randomly, thus creating jump scares.

name: Warranty Man

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4160 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 760 2 GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4670 AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: First person scary game set in an underground parking garage. Find your lost parking card, collect some cash to pay for your parking and get out before Warranty Man finds you and sells you auto insurance.
